definition: to be far from/to keep away from
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: In the beginning the quarries lay far beyond the city limits.
sentences.chinese: 起初採石場還遠離城市的邊界。

sentences.english: Bite valve cover protects from dirt and debris, includes a bite valve inside.
sentences.chinese: 咬合閥蓋保護閥遠離灰塵和碎片，包括內置咬氣門芯。

sentences.english: Russia has long wished to keep the West away from its backyard.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯長久以來都渴望讓西方國家遠離他的後院。

sentences.english: When Natalie finds out he is a detective she tells him to stay away from her family.
sentences.chinese: 當納塔莉發現他是一名偵探，她告訴他遠離她的家庭。

sentences.english: If you’re a burglar, tell me how to keep bad guys out of my house.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一個盜賊，告訴我怎樣讓壞蛋遠離我的家。

sentences.english: Today all that seems pale and thin and very far away.
sentences.chinese: 現在，一切都顯得疏落慘淡，一切都遠離我們而去。

sentences.english: How do you keep a pachyderm out of your garden?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣才能讓大象遠離你家的花園？

sentences.english: For clear skin, stay away from dairy.
sentences.chinese: 爲了擁有乾淨清透的皮膚，遠離奶製品。

sentences.english: Keep foods away from ranges or refrigerator exhausts.
sentences.chinese: 保持食物遠離爐竈或冰箱的排氣管。

sentences.english: Because Damon warned Isobel to stay away from her.
sentences.chinese: 因爲D警告伊莎貝爾遠離E。

sentences.english: For a low dribble the ball is dribbled on the side of your body opposite the defensive player.
sentences.chinese: 低運球時，球應處於你身體遠離防守球員的一側。

sentences.english: Lengthen the tailbone away from the back of your pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 拉長尾椎骨遠離盆骨的後側。

sentences.english: We love our home, though our feet can leave it, yet our hearts cannot.
sentences.chinese: 我們愛家，雖然我們的腳可以遠離它，心卻與它同在。

sentences.english: Never place your tree near a heat source, such as a fireplace or portable heater.
sentences.chinese: 讓樹遠離熱源，比如壁爐或便攜式加熱器。

sentences.english: All the way but go, gradually kept off last Lin Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 一路而行，漸漸地遠離了上林苑。

definition: to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
